name: my-hyperdev-app

scripts.unit:test: cross-env PORT=8080 NODE_ENV=test mocha --u tdd tests/1_unit-tests.js --exit
scripts.functional:test: cross-env PORT=8080 NODE_ENV=test mocha --u tdd tests/2_functional-tests.js --exit
scripts.test: cross-env PORT=8080 NODE_ENV=test mocha -u tdd tests/*-tests.js --exit
